column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I absolutely hate not being able to give this restaurant 5 stars. The ambiance alone deserves 10 stars. It's romantic
column4: it looks like something out of Boardwalk Empire. It is screaming Chicago. It is far away from the tourist zones. At the same time
column5: the noise level is great and I could see this being an amazing date night spot. Service was spectacular and attentive. The homemade bread was delicious. And they even have a coat check. So WHY in the world can I not give it 5 stars?
